name: Send a Gmail email confirmation and 2 follow-up emails for a new Wix form submission - part 1
description:
Every time a visitor fills out a Wix form on your site, Make will automatically send an email confirmation, a follow-up email the following day, and another one a week later (email is sent using Gmail).

This template is divided into 2 parts. In the first part, you retrieve the form submission data and send an email. In the second one, you're sending 2 follow-ups. You can find the second part [here](https://www.make.com/en/integration/5707-send-a-gmail-email-confirmation-and-2-follow-up-emails-for-a-new-wix-form-submission-part-2?templatePublicId=11013).
